This Privacy Policy (the *Policy*) describes how **FollowMyMus** (the *App*) collects, stores, and uses user data. ### 1. General Provisions
1.1. The App does not collect or process personal data that can directly or indirectly identify an individual (such as name, address, email address, phone number, etc.). 1.2. By using the App, the user agrees to this Policy.
---
### 2. Data We Process
To ensure proper operation of the user account, the App stores **only the following data**: - **Nickname (alias)** â€” used only as a display name and not linked to any personal identity; - **Password hash** â€” a cryptographically transformed representation of the password, which cannot be reversed to obtain the original password and does not contain any identifying information.
These data **do not allow identification of any specific person** and are not considered personal data under EU or Russian law.
---
### 3. Purpose of Data Processing
Data are processed exclusively for the following purposes: - to create and maintain a user account; - to ensure authentication and secure access.
---
### 4. Data Storage and Security
4.1. The data (nickname and password hash) are stored in the **Supabase** cloud service, which complies with modern international security standards. 4.2. We use technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of data. 4.3. When the user deletes their account, all associated data are permanently removed from storage.
---
### 5. Data Disclosure to Third Parties
5.1. We do not share, sell, or disclose user data to third parties. 5.2. Data may be disclosed only in response to lawful requests from government authorities, as required by applicable law.
---
### 6. User Rights
Users have the right to: - request information about stored data; - request deletion of their account and associated data; - withdraw consent to data processing (if applicable).
---
### 7. Changes to This Policy
We may update this Policy from time to time. The current version is always available within the App or on the official website. The date of the latest update is indicated at the top of the document.
